name: TP67's Repo
subtitle: My recommended library of apps to sideload.
description: Welcome to my repo. Here you can find my favorite apps to sideload.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: 授权后才能使用您的相机进行扫一扫
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: 开启定位服务，我们将根据您的位置,为您提供相关信息。在未经许可前不会开启定位服务，请放心使用。
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: 授权后才能将图片保存到本地相册
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: 授权后才能访问您的手机相册，您才能上传对应的图片
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YouTube will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.

apps.name: Delta
apps.subtitle: Roblox Executor
apps.localizedDescription: I recommend to use this on ether a dummy account or a alt account as this might make Roblox ban you.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Roblox uses your camera to check your age, animate your avatar, and scan QR codes.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Connect with friends on Roblox. Your contacts will be regularly synced and matches with other Roblox users will be stored to help you find friends. You can manage this any time in settings.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Roblox needs access to local networks to connect to players around you.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Roblox needs access to your location to improve your user experience
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Roblox needs access to your microphone for voice chat.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: Roblox needs access to the accelerometer to enhance your play experience.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow Roblox to access your photo library so you can save images and videos to your device's camera roll.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Roblox needs access to your photos to enhance your play experience.
